QuestData.Title: Breaking Down Netherock
QuestData.Description: To whomever cares about the timely construction of the X-52 Nether-Rocket --$B$BThe king of the local mountain giants, Netherock, has been terrorizing the Crumbling Wastes. He's been interfering with operations all along the south ledge of the island!$B$BTake your friends and deal with him! Then, return to me here in Area 52.$B$BRocket-Chief Fuselage
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Netherock and then report in with Rocket-Chief Fuselage at Area 52 in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.CompletionText: What? What?! Be quick about it... there's so much to do around here.$B$BI want to get this thing off the ground some day, you know?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh! Oh... you took care of Netherock. Good news that!$B$BWith that troublesome mountain giant out of the picture, we should have an easier time of exploi... er, husbanding the resources of the Crumbling Wastes.$B$BGlad to hear that those poor, innocent elementals down there won't be getting squished by him.$B$BHow ever can I repay you?
